grantCalls.title: National Science Foundation Research Grant
grantCalls.scope: Basic research in computer science, engineering, and mathematics
grantCalls.requirements: PhD required, minimum 3 years research experience, detailed budget proposal

grantCalls.title: Healthcare Innovation Challenge
grantCalls.sponsor: Department of Health and Human Services
grantCalls.scope: Innovative solutions for healthcare delivery and patient outcomes
grantCalls.eligibility: Healthcare organizations, research institutions, private companies
grantCalls.requirements: Proof of concept, partnership with healthcare provider, regulatory compliance plan

grantCalls.title: Environmental Sustainability Program
grantCalls.scope: Projects focused on climate change mitigation and environmental protection
grantCalls.eligibility: Non-profit organizations, educational institutions, state and local governments
grantCalls.requirements: Environmental impact assessment, community engagement plan, measurable outcomes

grantCalls.title: Small Business Innovation Research Grant
grantCalls.scope: Technology development and commercialization for small businesses
grantCalls.eligibility: Small businesses with fewer than 500 employees
grantCalls.requirements: Business plan, technical feasibility study, commercialization strategy

grantCalls.title: Advanced Manufacturing Research Initiative
grantCalls.scope: Research and development in advanced manufacturing technologies
grantCalls.requirements: Multi-institutional collaboration, technology transfer plan, industry matching funds
